name: part_001
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】AZKi SOLO LiVE 2025 ＂Departure＂【ぴあアリーナMM】 [7UlZnyO79Xg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: A slideshow of fan messages and concert information screens for 'AZKi SOLO LiVE 2025 Departure' plays over instrumental music.
An advertisement for JOYSOUND's 'Do-Anime Sengen' featuring an anime girl talking about singing karaoke with anime scenes.

subtitles.original:
開演までしばらくお待ちください
The concert will be starting soon.
subtitles.english: The concert will be starting soon.

subtitles.original:
演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください
Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.
声出し応援OKです
Cheering loudly is OK.
subtitles.english:
Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.
Cheering loudly is OK.

subtitles.original:
ライブグッズ 2次販売決定!!
11.19公演終了後〜
subtitles.english:
Live goods second wave sale decided!!
From after the 11.19 performance~

subtitles.original: アニメにハマって、歌いたくなっちゃった。
subtitles.english: I got into anime and wanted to sing.

subtitles.original: 推しのシーン見ながらカラオケ歌えるなんて...
subtitles.english: Being able to sing karaoke while watching my favorite scenes...
